description: Beginning with the natural numbers, swap [ k*sqrt(3) ] and [ (k/2)*(3 + sqrt(3)) ], for all k >= 1.
comments: Self-inverse integer permutation induced by Beatty sequences for sqrt(3) and (3+sqrt(3))/2. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 11 2005
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Beatty Sequence
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
Index entries for sequences related to Beatty sequences
formula: a(A022838(n)) = A054406(n) and a(A054406(n)) = A022838(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 11 2005
author: _Clark Kimberling_
